title: Russia claims Bucha civilian massacre faked as a "provocation" as outrage builds over Ukraine war atrocities
content:
1. Russia claims Bucha civilian massacre faked as a "provocation" as outrage builds over Ukraine war atrocities  CBS News
  2. Ukraine war: International condemnation over Bucha killings  Al Jazeera English
  3. Ukraine accuses Russia of massacre, city strewn with bodies  POLITICO
  4. Images of dead civilians in Ukraine shake the world  CNN
  5. Japan 'really shocked' by killing of civilians in Ukraine -gov't spokesman  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ロシアはブチャの民間人虐殺を「挑発」として捏造したと主張、ウクライナ戦争の残虐行為に対する怒りが高まっている。
俄罗斯称布卡平民大屠杀是伪造的 "挑衅"，对乌克兰战争暴行的愤慨在不断增加
俄羅斯稱布卡平民大屠殺是僞造的 "挑釁"，對烏克蘭戰爭暴行的憤慨在不斷增加
